span.a: You are currently on this page - District Home

td.h2: Welcome to Flora Community Unit School District #35

input.title: Reset All Form Fields and Start Again

span.span: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker announced that remote learning in Illinois will be extended through April 30 in order to slow down the spread of COVID-19.

During this time, on-site learning will remain suspended but our schools’ commitment to learning and education will remain open and learning will continue for all students - just through a different format.

While it is not ideal, we want to assure you that at Flora CUSD #35, our teachers and staff are fully engaged and willing to take on this new challenge and push forward with remote learning, engaging with students and continuing with our food distribution program. A copy of our remote learning plan is posted below.

I know this is not the school year that any of us imagined, but I want to thank you for your patience and understanding as we have dealt with this unprecedented situation together. If you have any questions or need assistance please contact the unit office at 618-662-2412 or e-mail jhackney@floraschools.com.
The links below contain remote learning activities and information for Flora Elementary School Music, Art, PE, and Band.

span.b: Steps to log into Google Classroom

p.span: Click Plus Sign in Upper Right Hand Corner of the page
Enter class code provided by the teacher

td.h3: Flora High School Wall of Honor Application

h2.span: The Student Council of FHS has designed a "Wall of Honor" for veterans that graduated from Flora High School. The nameplates on the wall will feature the name, graduation year, and branch of service for the veteran.

Applications can be filled out by the veterans themselves or by someone of relation. They are available either electronically or can be printed and submitted to Flora High School where there are also forms in the main office.
Flora CUSD #35 has created a Former Educator Hall of Fame for former educators in the Flora school district.
Nominations can be printed and submitted to the Flora Unit Office, mailed to 630 Vincennes, Flora, IL 62839, or e-mailed to jhackney@floraschools.com.

td.a: Former Educator Hall of Fame Nomination Form
